name: slack
description: Read and send Slack messages, list channels, fetch thread history, and search across your workspace. Lets agents triage notifications, post summaries, and keep teams updated without leaving your workflow.
author: Anthropic

env_vars.label: Bot Token
env_vars.description: A Slack Bot User OAuth Token (starts with xoxb-). Create a Slack app at api.slack.com/apps and install it to your workspace.

env_vars.label: Team ID
env_vars.description: Your Slack workspace Team ID. Find it in your workspace URL or via the Slack API.

setup_notes: Create a Slack app at api.slack.com/apps. Add the Bot Token Scopes: channels:read, chat:write, users:read. Install the app to your workspace to get the Bot Token.
